metadata.title: CVE-2023-51780 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. do_vcc_ioctl innet/atm/ioctl.c has a use-after-free because of a vcc_recvmsg racecondition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51780` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic-64k - 6.8.0-11.11
No subscription required
